Hacking communication science
ICA 2020 preconference hackathon.

A two day hands-on workshop to encourage open, non-competitive, collaboration across communication subfields
utilizing computational and "big data" methods.

What's a Hackathon?

Advancing open research practices in communication is contingent upon sharing tools, ideas, skills, and data across a disparate collection of sub-fields. Although conferences and workshops...
